ValidationRule.description: If lost reason is Customer - Bad Timing, Lost to Competition - Bid, or Lost to Competition - Under Existing Contract, the Date to Revisit is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR( ISPICKVAL(Lost_Reason__c , "Customer - Bad Timing, Will Revisit"), ISPICKVAL(Lost_Reason__c , "Lost to Competition - Bid"), ISPICKVAL(Lost_Reason__c , "Customer - Under Existing Contract")), ISBLANK(Date_to_Revisit__c), ISBLANK(Date_of_Rebid__c), RecordTypeId <> "01270000000E0MT", $Profile.Id <> "00e70000000swa5", $Profile.Id <> "00e5w000001nr5t", $Profile.Id <> "00e5w000001xwik", $Profile.Id <> "00e70000000zomX", $Profile.Id <> "00e70000000j606" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Based on the Lost Reason you chose, Date to Revisit is required. A notification will be sent to the opportunity owner on this date as a reminder to reconsider this opportunity.
